name: You Must Succ
description:
Just die as much as you can bro.

Controls: ARROW or WASD to move and jump
Hold UP or W for longer jumps
SPACE or ENTER to shoot

EDIT: Art was NOT made by me, it was stolen from VEXED lol. 
https://v3x3d.itch.io/retro-lines

Thanks so much to all the guys who vibed with me in the live streams. Specially David who was like there all the time
